summary: Provides a reference implementation for fine‑tuning a Stable Diffusion 1.5 model with DreamBooth using LoRA adapters. It defines datasets for instance and class images, handles prompt tokenization and embedding management, and includes utilities for loading, saving, and uploading the adapted model within a distributed training setup powered by Accelerate.
business_intent: Allows developers and enterprises to quickly customize text‑to‑image generation models with their own visual concepts, supporting branding, marketing, and product visualization by training lightweight LoRA adapters on custom image collections.
